test_details.name: utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities calculateTimeRemaining should calculate future dates correctly
utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities calculateTimeRemaining should handle past dates
utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities calculateTimeRemaining should identify "happening now" status for near future
utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities calculateTimeRemaining should handle exact current time
utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities formatCountdownDisplay should format upcoming countdown
utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities formatCountdownDisplay should format past countdown
utils.test.ts::Time Calculation Utilities formatCountdownDisplay should show "Happening now!" for happening status
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should have tests for Requirement 1: Build a form to create countdowns with all specified fields
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should have tests for Requirement 2: Show beautiful full-screen countdown with animated flipping numbers
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should have tests for Requirement 3: Generate unique short URLs for each countdown
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should have tests for Requirement 4: For logged-in users, display all countdowns in grid view
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should have tests for Requirement 5: Handle three states: upcoming, happening now, past
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should have tests for Requirement 6: Offer preset themes and custom color picker
requirement-mapping.test.ts::Requirement Coverage Verification should cover all 6 requirements from the prompt
pages.test.tsx::Pages - Requirements Home shows user countdown grid when logged in (Requirement 4)
pages.test.tsx::Pages - Requirements Browse lists public countdowns (Requirement 3)
components.test.tsx::Frontend Components - Requirements CountdownForm renders required fields, supports themes, and allows custom colors
components.test.tsx::Frontend Components - Requirements CountdownForm converts date+time using selected timezone (edge case: non-UTC)
components.test.tsx::Frontend Components - Requirements CountdownForm can search Unsplash and select a background image
components.test.tsx::Frontend Components - Requirements CountdownDisplay shows days/hours/minutes/seconds and correct state text
full-flow.test.ts::Integration - Full Flow registers, logs in (Passport local), creates private countdown, and enforces privacy
full-flow.test.ts::Integration - Full Flow creates a public countdown accessible without auth and visible in /public browse
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements creates a countdown with required fields + timezone + customization
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements validates required fields and color format (edge cases)
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements returns days/hours/minutes/seconds breakdown with status
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements generates unique slugs and allows public viewing without auth
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements enforces private countdowns are not accessible without auth, but accessible to owner (edge case)
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements returns logged-in user countdowns sorted by nearest upcoming date, then most recent past
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements supports reset (PATCH targetDate) and archive (PATCH isArchived), and archived countdowns disappear
countdowns.test.ts::Countdown API - Requirements supports preset themes and custom colors

requirement_coverage.requirement: Requirement 1: Build a form to create countdowns with all specified fields
Requirement 2: Show beautiful full-screen countdown with animated flipping numbers
Requirement 3: Generate unique short URLs for each countdown
Requirement 4: For logged-in users, display all countdowns in grid view
Requirement 5: Handle three states: upcoming, happening now, past
Requirement 6: Offer preset themes and custom color picker
